content: This construction opportunity is for the Roadway Widening and Reconstruction in Montgomery County, New York. The project includes providing all labor, materials, machinery, tools, equipment, and other means of construction necessary to complete the work shown on the plans and described in the specifications. The due date for the submission of quotes is 02/23/2023 at 2:00 PM. The primary contact for this project is Jaclyn Hernigle, the Purchasing Agent for Montgomery County.
